text:
1660-1662 West Farms Road, east side, between East 172nd and East 174th Streets, showing the yard of the Bell Scrap Iron and Metal Corporation. The view is in a southerly direction as seen from the head of East 173rd Street.

P. L. Sperr.

April 4, 1936.
title: Bronx: West Farms Road.
